formulas.raw: Taxable Income: TI = \max\{0,\ (GI - PD) - D\} Progressive State Tax (by filing status s): Tax_{pre\_cred} = \sum_{i} r_i \cdot \max\{0,\ \min(TI, u_i) - \ell_i\} where each bracket i has rate r_i and bounds [ℓ_i, u_i). For the top bracket, u_i = \infty. Personal Exemption Credit (PEC): PEC = \begin{cases} 236 \times n_{ex}, & \text{if } AGI \le \theta_s \\ 0, & \text{otherwise} \end{cases} Net State Income Tax: Tax_{state} = \max\{0,\ Tax_{pre\_cred} - PEC\} Optional Local and Transit Taxes: T_{transit} = 0.001 \times GI T_{Metro} = 0.01 \times \max\{0,\ TI - \alpha_s\} T_{PFA} = 0.015 \times \max\{0,\ \min(TI, \beta_s) - \alpha_s\} + 0.015 \times \max\{0,\ TI - \beta_s\} Total: T_{total} = Tax_{state} + T_{transit} + T_{Metro} + T_{PFA} Effective Rate: ER = 100 \times \frac{T_{total}}{GI}\ \%
